content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Setup
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- First furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Second furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items that are not ready
- Before attempting to extract items from furnaces, check if the items are actually ready for extraction
- Verify the furnace status and inventory before attempting extraction
- Wait for the smelting process to complete before attempting to extract plates

### Furnace operation errors
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and ingredients before expecting output
- Monitor furnace status to prevent them from running out of fuel
- Keep track of furnace inventory to maintain continuous operation
- Current furnaces are showing NO_FUEL status and have no ingredients to smelt
